languages.text: {n}Хротко звучно клацает прикладом и недобрым голосом интересуется:{/n} "Что у нас тут, измена? Покушение на офицера? Давно я чуял, что от ткачей будут беды..."

{n}Hrotko clangs the stock of his weapon soundly. In a sneering tone, he asks,{/n} "What do we have here, treason? An attempted assassination of a senior officer? I have long expected trouble from you spinners..."
languages.original_text: {n}Хротко звучно клацает прикладом и недобрым голосом интересуется:{/n} "Что у нас тут, измена? Покушение на офицера? Давно я чуял, что от ткачей будут беды..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko clangs his buttstock soundly and asks in a nasty voice::{/n} "What do we have here, treason? An attempted assassination of a senior officer? I have long expected trouble from the weavers..."

{n}Hrotko clangs the stock of his weapon soundly. In a sneering tone, he asks,{/n} "What do we have here, treason? An attempted assassination of a senior officer? I have long expected trouble from you spinners..."

{n}Hrotko clangs the stock of his weapon soundly. In a sneering tone, he asks,{/n} "What do we have here, treason? An attempted assassination of a senior officer? I have long expected trouble from you spinners..."

languages.text: {n}Hrotko golpea sonoramente la culata de su arma. Con tono burlón, pregunta:{/n} «¿Qué tenemos aquí, traición? ¿Intento de asesinato de un oficial veterano? Llevo mucho tiempo esperando problemas de los tejedores...».
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko clangs the stock of his weapon soundly. In a sneering tone, he asks,{/n} "What do we have here, treason? An attempted assassination of a senior officer? I have long expected trouble from you spinners..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko golpea sonoramente la culata de su arma. Con tono burlón, pregunta:{/n} «¿Qué tenemos aquí, traición? ¿Intento de asesinato de un oficial veterano? Llevo mucho tiempo esperando problemas de los tejedores...».

languages.text: {n}フロトコは、武器のストックを音を立てて鳴らす。嘲笑するような口調で尋ねた。{/n}「反乱か？上級士官の暗殺か？ずっと、紡績工が何か問題を起こすと思っていた…」
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko clangs the stock of his weapon soundly. In a sneering tone, he asks,{/n} "What do we have here, treason? An attempted assassination of a senior officer? I have long expected trouble from you spinners..."

traits.locale_text: {n}フロトコは、武器のストックを音を立てて鳴らす。嘲笑するような口調で尋ねた。{/n}「反乱か？上級士官の暗殺か？ずっと、ウィーヴァーが何か問題を起こすと思っていた…」

languages.text: {n}赫洛卡凶狠地拍了一下枪托，以充满嘲弄的口吻问道。{/n}“这是怎么回事？叛国行为？企图刺杀高阶军官？我早就知道你们这些织网者会惹麻烦……”
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko clangs the stock of his weapon soundly. In a sneering tone, he asks,{/n} "What do we have here, treason? An attempted assassination of a senior officer? I have long expected trouble from you spinners..."

traits.locale_text: {n}赫洛卡凶狠地拍了一下枪托，以充满嘲弄的口吻问道。{/n}“这是怎么回事？叛国行为？企图刺杀高阶军官？我早就知道你们这些织网者会惹麻烦……”

languages.text: {n}Hrotko schlägt lautstark gegen den Schaft seiner Waffe. Mit verächtlichem Ton fragt er:{/n} "Was haben wir denn hier, Verrat? Ein versuchtes Attentat auf einen leitenden Offizier? Ich habe schon lange damit gerechnet, dass Ihr Spinner Ärger macht ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko clangs the stock of his weapon soundly. In a sneering tone, he asks,{/n} "What do we have here, treason? An attempted assassination of a senior officer? I have long expected trouble from you spinners..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko schlägt lautstark gegen den Schaft seiner Waffe. Mit verächtlichem Ton fragt er:{/n} "Was haben wir denn hier, Verrat? Ein versuchtes Attentat auf einen leitenden Offizier? Ich habe schon lange damit gerechnet, dass Ihr Spinner Ärger macht ..."

languages.text: {n}Hrotko fait brusquement claquer la crosse de son arme.{/n} « Qu'avons-nous là ? Une trahison ? {n}demande-t-il d'une voix narquoise.{/n} Une tentative d'assassinat d'un officier supérieur ? Je savais depuis longtemps que les tisseurs finiraient par nous causer des ennuis... »
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko clangs the stock of his weapon soundly. In a sneering tone, he asks,{/n} "What do we have here, treason? An attempted assassination of a senior officer? I have long expected trouble from you spinners..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko fait brusquement claquer la crosse de son arme.{/n} « Qu'avons-nous là ? Une trahison ? {n}demande-t-il d'une voix narquoise.{/n} Une tentative d'assassinat d'un officier supérieur ? Je savais depuis longtemps que les tisseurs finiraient par nous causer des ennuis... »

languages.text: {n}Hrotko, silahının kıçını iyice tıngırdatıyor. Alaycı bir tavırla soruyor.{/n} "Bu da ne ola, ihanet mi? Kıdemli bir subaya suikast girişimi mi? Zaten siz dokurların başımıza bir iş açacağı epeydir belliydi..."
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko clangs the stock of his weapon soundly. In a sneering tone, he asks,{/n} "What do we have here, treason? An attempted assassination of a senior officer? I have long expected trouble from you spinners..."
